scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" npx cucumber-js features/ui/recording-*.feature --import 'features/steps/ui/recording-*.steps.ts' --format progress
scripts.test:ui: NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" npx cucumber-js features/ui/recording-*.feature --import 'features/steps/ui/recording-*.steps.ts' --format progress
scripts.record-and-test: npm run record && npm run generate && npm test
